mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ST_PM_COLCT_SUM ( COLCT_DT /* 수집일자 */ , COLCT_HOUR /* 수집시간 */ , COLCT_MI /* 수집분 */ , PM_ID /* 물리서버ID */ , INSTITUTION_ID /* 기관ID */ , JOB_ID /* 업무ID */ , REGION_ID /* 리전ID mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ST_PM_COLCT_SUM WHERE COLCT_DT = #{colctDt} /* 수집일자 */ AND COLCT_HOUR = #{colctHour} /* 수집시간 */ AND COLCT_MI = #{colctMi} /* 수집분 */ AND PM_ID = #{pmId} /* 물리서버ID */
